item.title: Lab 10 Problem 3
item.description: How I Built This Page # How the Page Was Built # Using the default Vim text editor on my machine, I made this page as a Markdown (.md) file, which is what the Hugo framework uses as its default content format. The process of making a site using Hugo involves writing content in Markdown and using Hugo to process it. Installation: I installed Hugo using the package manager for my system (e.
